original: MALMROS, Carl Johan Martin, Disponent, Klippan, f ö Sönnarslöv, Krst l, 23/12 74 av Carl Johan M o Betty M, gm Iris Fahlberg. Aff.elev Krst 90, etabl eg fma m fabr o sen av kolimp 97, kont.ch Sv kalkförsäljn.AB i Malmö 03, disp 05, disp o vkst dir Klippans finpappersbr m dtrbol 08. Styr.led Skand bkn (ordf avd.kont Klp), Sv sockerfabr.AB, AB Landsverk, Sv finpappersbr :s försäljn.AB, Sv Ind.frb, ordf Sv pappersbr:s HAB, Sv pap-persbr.frn, Sv:s pappersbr.frb, Sydsv virkes-frn, sjöförsäkr.AB Öresund, Höganäs—Billesh AB, v. ordf S Sv ångpannefrn, Sk cement, AB Iföverken, Strömsnäs Bruks AB, Sv arb.giv.frn. Led Sk hdlskammis flm o vkst utsk. Ordf Klp skyt.komp. KVOlkl, RNO, RFinlVROlkl.
translated: MALMROS, Carl Johan Martin, Manager, Klippan, born in Sönnarslöv, Christened on 23/12 1874, son of Carl Johan M and Betty M, married to Iris Fahlberg. Apprentice in business, Christened 1890, established own company in coal import 1897, sales accountant at Swedish Lime Sales AB in Malmö in 1903, manager in 1905, manager and deputy director of Klippans Fine Paper Mill daughter company in 1908. Board member of Skandinaviska Banken (chairman of financial department in Klippan), Swedish Sugar Factory AB, AB Landsverk, Swedish Fine Paper Sales AB, Swedish Industrial Association, chairman of Swedish Paper Industry's Trade Association, Swedish Paper Industry's Joint Federation, South Swedish Timber Federation, Öresund Maritime Insurance Co. Ltd., Höganäs—Billesh AB, deputy chairman of South Swedish Steam Boiler Manufacturing Co., Skåne Cement, AB Iföverken, Strömsnäs Bruks AB, Swedish Employers Association. Member of Chamber of Commerce and Industrial Development Committee. Chairman of Klippan Shooting Company, Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav, Order of the Finnish Lion 1st Class.

memberOf.name: Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav
Order of the Finnish Lion 1st Class
